name: Ziaul Roshan
content:
Ziaul Roshan is a Bangladeshi film actor and model who appears in Bangladesh films. His father is a politician from Bangladesh.
 Roshan started his career by modeling. in 2016 he made his debut Rokto opposite Porimoni, was released both in Bangladesh and India. the film was Indo-Bangla joint production. Dhat Teri Ki is his second film with Farin Khan, Arifin Shuvoo and Nusraat Faria Mazhar in opposite role.
 Ziaul Roshan earned his BBA degree from Independent University, Bangladesh.
 
 This Bangladeshi biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.

Ziaul RoshanBornNovember 8Akhaura Upazila, Brahmanbaria, BangladeshNationalityBangladeshiAlma materIndependent University, BangladeshOccupationActorKnown forRoktoDhat Teri KiCockpitBeporowa
Ziaul Roshan is a Bangladeshi film actor and model who appears in Bangladesh films. His father is a politician from Bangladesh.

Contents

1 Career
2 Education
3 Filmography

3.1 Web works


4 References
5 External links


Career[edit]
Roshan started his career by modeling. in 2016 he made his debut Rokto opposite Porimoni, was released both in Bangladesh and India. the film was Indo-Bangla joint production. Dhat Teri Ki is his second film with Farin Khan, Arifin Shuvoo and Nusraat Faria Mazhar in opposite role.

Education[edit]
Ziaul Roshan earned his BBA degree from Independent University, Bangladesh.
